### About (the academic) me
  
---

<br>
<div style="text-align: right"> <p>&quot;<em>Cammino in mezzo agli altri, tutti più o meno uguali<br>
E canto nella testa un poco di Brunori SAS<br>
Faccio parte anch'io di quest'aurea mediocritas.<br>
E vado ricercando medie senza varianza, un pò di stabilità<br>
Male non fa</em>&quot;<br>
Romastino - [Translation](https://translate.google.com/?sl=auto&tl=en&text=Cammino%20in%20mezzo%20agli%20altri%2C%20tutti%20più%20o%20meno%20uguali%0AE%20canto%20nella%20testa%20un%20poco%20di%20Brunori%20SAS%0AFaccio%20parte%20anch%27io%20di%20quest%27aurea%20mediocritas.%0AE%20vado%20ricercando%20medie%20senza%20varianza%2C%20un%20pò%20di%20stabilità%0AMale%20non%20fa%0A&op=translate)
</p>
</div>


<img style="float: left;vertical-align:middle;margin:0px 20px;border-radius: 20px;
  " src="images/fd.jpg" width="160"> 
  
I am an Assistant Professor (RtdB) at the [Department of Statistics of University of Padua](https://www.stat.unipd.it).

Previously, I held the role of Assistant Professor (RtdA) at the [Department of Statistics of Università Cattolica del Sacro Cuore - Milan](https://dipartimenti.unicatt.it/scienze_statistiche).  
Prior to that, I spent two years as a Postdoctoral Scholar at the [Department of Statistics of Univerisity of California - Irvine](https://www.stat.uci.edu/) (UCI), working under the supervision of Professor [Babak Shahbaba](https://www.ics.uci.edu/~babaks/).  

I obtained a Ph.D. in Statistics at University of Milan - Bicocca and Università della Svizzera italiana (joint program, awarded with honors) working with Professor [Antonietta Mira](https://search.usi.ch/en/people/f8960de6d60dd08a79b6c1eb20b7442b/mira-antonietta) and Professor [Michele Guindani](https://www.micheleguindani.info).  

I am interested in Bayesian mixtures, Bayesian nonparametrics, model-based clustering, shrinkage priors, and dimensionality reduction.
